in_ports.name: rectangles
in_ports.hint:
For rectangle, consisting of integer pixels (x,y): x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂,
this array must contain 4 numbers (x₁+x₂)/2, (y₁+y₂)/2, x₂−x₁+1, y₂−y₁+1 (i.e. the center and sizes).
Usually first two numbers are integers or half-integer, and the last two are integer.

in_ports.name: object_label
in_ports.hint: [Optional] If specified, object labels for new contours will be elements of this array.

out_ports.name: contours
out_ports.hint:
Contours: each rectangle is converted to 4-point contour of the object, equal to this filled rectangle.
Note that rectangle 10x10, 0≤x≤9, 0≤y≤9, will be converted to contour with vertices (0,0), (10,0), (10,10), (10,0); it will not contain vertex (9,9).

controls.name: objectLabel
controls.caption: Objects' label
controls.description: Used if "object_label" array is not specified or has insufficient length.

controls.name: internalContour
controls.caption: Internal contours
controls.description: If set, the result contours will be internal (anticlockwise).
